%if packageName =="domain"%
Package { %TRANSFORM_CURRENT()%
Class { %TRANSFORM_REFERENCE("DAO_Generation", classGUID)% %TRANSFORM_CURRENT("name","stereotype","language")% name="DAO_Generation_Class" stereotype="dao generator" language="Java"
Attribute { name="daoGenerator" type="DAO_Generation_Class" scope="private" default="null" static="true" }
Operation { name="of" stereotype="built in" type="DAO_Generation_Class" static="true"
code="//singleton
if(daoGenerator==null)
 daoGenerator = new DAO_Generation_Class();

return daoGenerator;" }
